rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Scandinavian minimalist design incorporating warm tones and natural lighting. The orientation is east-facing to harness morning sunlight as per Vastu principles.
Functional dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with light wood finishes and glass elements for a modern touch. Positioned in the north-east corner to ensure positive energy flow.

Modern Scandinavian kitchen with an open layout, designed with efficiency and workflow in mind. Features ample storage and is placed near the dining area for convenience. South-west orientation maintains balance.
Master bedroom on ground floor with an adjoining bathroom, located in the south-east corner to promote comfort and stability as per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom designed for a joint family member. Positioned opposite the master bedroom with access to a shared corridor.
Bedroom tailored for children or extended family members, placed in the north-west corner to ensure positive energy and quiet surroundings.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with a Scandinavian aesthetic. Vastu compliant by aligning to the north-east sector for auspicious entry.
Large window designed to maximize natural light and provide a view of the exterior, ensuring a balanced energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Interior door connecting living room to dining area, designed for ease of movement and maintaining privacy. Its placement supports the flow of energy.
Balcony door providing access to a small outdoor space, integrating indoor-outdoor living and promoting fresh air circulation.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom for the joint family, maintaining Scandinavian simplicity with clean lines and light colors. Placed in a strategic corner to ensure privacy.
Bedroom designed for guest accommodation or extended family use, ensuring quietness and relaxation, placed away from high-traffic areas.
Study/office room with ample natural light. Utilized for remote work or as a study area, situated in the north-east corner to promote focus and creativity.
Modern bathroom attached to one of the bedrooms. Scandinavian design emphasizes functionality and minimalism while incorporating Vastu principles for health.

openings.description: Large window to maximize light in bedrooms and the study area, ensuring a balanced distribution of natural energy.
Interior door connecting rooms for ease of movement, designed with clean Scandinavian aesthetics.
Access door leading to the rooftop terrace. The terrace is designed as an open recreational space with Scandinavian minimalism, featuring outdoor seating and greenery.

levels.notes: The rooftop terrace provides a communal outdoor living area for the joint family, incorporating sustainable design elements such as solar shading and rainwater harvesting systems. The layout respects Vastu principles by allowing unobstructed views of the horizon.
